metadata.Title: CVE-2022-35035 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - negligible.
metadata.Description: OTFCC commit 617837b was discovered to contain a heap buffer overflow via /release-x64/otfccdump+0x6b559f.

notes.Note: ebarretto> From Debian: The otfccdump binary is not build by any source package, hence we are not affected. Yes, we carry the source code of the program, but we don't use it.

criterions.comment: texlive-bin package in lunar is affected and may need fixing.
